pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, March 15, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks in the House of Commons. An address to Parliament from the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, will follow.

House of Commons
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • The address to Parliament will be streamed live via the following link: https://parlvu.parl.gc.ca/Harmony/en/PowerBrowser/PowerBrowserV2/20220315/-1/36641
